parameters.name: ActionType
parameters.description:
The action of the custom defense rule. Valid values:

*   **0**: allow
*   **1**: block

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the custom defense rule.

parameters.name: NewFilePath
parameters.description: The new file path after the file is renamed.

parameters.name: ParentProcPath
parameters.description: The path to the parent process.

parameters.name: Platform
parameters.description:
The type of the operating system. Valid values:

*   **windows**: Windows
*   **linux**: Linux
*   **all**: all types

parameters.name: Port
parameters.description: The port number. This parameter is deprecated.

parameters.name: PortStr
parameters.description: The port number. Valid values: **1 to 65535**.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the custom defense rule. Valid values:

*   **1**: Process hash
*   **2**: Command line
*   **3**: Process Network
*   **4**: File Read and Write
*   **5**: Operation on Registry
*   **6**: Dynamic-link Library Loading
*   **7**: File Renaming
